item.title: Kremlin says Putin agreed to Trump meeting 'in the coming days'
item.description: The Kremlin has confirmed that Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin have agreed to a meeting, though a specific date or location has yet to be announced.

item.title: Police seek man in connection with shooting that killed 1 woman, injured 2 officers
item.description: Police are seeking a man considered armed and dangerous after two cops were shot while responding to a domestic assault call where a woman was found w...

item.title: Sweeping new tariffs take effect, risking price increases
item.description: Tariffs between 41% and 10% targeted nearly 70 countries.

item.title: WATCH: New Yorker spends decades carving model of NYC
item.description: A truck driver from Queens has gone viral on TikTok for showcasing a wooden model of New York City that he's been working on for the past two decades.

item.title: WATCH: Flash flooding in northern India sweeps away Himalayan village
